description: After the installation of the security update referenced in KB5040442, users of the Microsoft Active Directory Rights Management Services client may experience unexpected behavior due to a privilege escalation vulnerability in the Tencent RapidJSON library. This issue could manifest as restricted access to files, wherein users may find they are unable to open, modify, or delete certain files that were previously accessible. The affected products include Windows 10 and Windows 11 systems running build numbers 10.0.22631.3880, 10.0.22621.3880, 10.0.19045.4651, and 10.0.22000.3079. Additionally, if users are tricked into opening malicious JSON files related to this vulnerability, they may also experience elevated risks of unauthorized access to sensitive information. It is important for system administrators to monitor affected systems for these observable behaviors, which indicate underlying security concerns following the vulnerability disclosure.
